topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53719ecc6368720df1960300#post_53719ecc6368720df1960300
he was like , hyping the music video for headlights since friday, and was all like "this is art, this is old school, so much beautifull and so much arts"

then the video hits and its a dissapointment.

the recording was like so amateur with the camera in your face like.

the scenario was nothing like the song deescribed it.

some sets feel too good looking for the house of a poor person.

the song even cut the final verse, like wtf.

"just look by yourself":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7bDLIV96LD4&feature=kp

its just too much lost potential for otherwise the best song out of the album, there is no excuse.

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5371a16863687274b9880000#post_5371a16863687274b9880000
He's got some sort of weird issue with Quentin Tarantino. My choosing of sides goes like this: who has made more movies that I love?

Spike Lee: Do the Right Thing, American History X.

Quentin Tarantino: Pulp Fiction (my all time favorite movie ever), Reservoir Dogs, Jackie Brown, Kill Bill, Inglorious Basterds, and Django Unchained. In fact the only Tarantino movie I don't like is Death Proof, and even then I only dislike parts of it.
